DOC.brief_summary: The overall objective study contribute scientific basis dietary life strategy , policy dietary guideline infant young child Denmark special focus prevention obesity diet related chronic disease type 2 diabetes , ischemic heart disease osteoporosis .
DOC.detailed_description: The SKOT I study prospective cohort study monitor healthy young child 9 36 month age . In 2007 , 2211 family Copenhagen randomly select National Civil Registry invite participate study letter . The participant invite three examination 9 month ±2 week , 18 month ±4 week 36 month ±3 month . A total 330 child include study , 312 complete 9 month examination , 291 complete 18 month examination 263 complete 3-year examination . All examination take place Department Nutrition , Exercise Sports , Frederiksberg Denmark . The examination involve collect broad spectrum data . Following data collect : anthropometry ( weight , height , age- sex-specific Z-scores body composition , triceps subscapularis skinfolds ) , background interview ( concern e.g . infant feeding , household income , parent 's educational level , allergy chronic disease ) , blood pressure ( systolic , diastolic mean arterial pressure ) , faeces- urine sample , blood sample ( 9 36 month ) , Bio impedance analysis ( 36 month ) , 7 day diet registration , general questionaire ( concern e.g . sleep , daycare , attendance use screen device ) , psychomotor questionnaire ( motoric development ) , 7 day physical activity monitor dual energy x-ray absorptiometry scan ( 36 month ) .
DOC.criteria: healthy singleton born term ( week 3743 ) August 2006 September 2007 disease could influence food intake growth bear preterm ( week 37 ) nonDanish speaking parent .
